overview: Bar, a student who has a lot of growing up to do and is unfortunately also a bit ignorant, needs to study for an exam with Yair, a fellow student of his who just happens to be homosexual, or else risk failure. In the days leading up to the exam Bar doesn't miss a single error in the ways of tact, but manages to learn a lot as well, and not just for the test. Along the way he discovers that he can be physically attracted to another man, when before he wouldn't dare say who is better looking: a movie star or a funny looking old comedian, he stands up for a gay couple - so what if he winds up doing even more damage? And he discovers a new friend, who he finds even intriguing, and so what if he is gay?
title: Homo Sapiens
